name: Never Forget Me
description: Love stories don't end with marriage...can you reach your happily ever after? Sequel of the popular Always Remember Me, in this dating sim you play the married couple life. Can you stay together until the end?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 1Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card Storage: 50 MB available space
